response.overview: A part of the 4-piece project about a state of mind that you experience when you are surfing Internet way too long, about visual information overdose, about seeing hundreds, or even thousands of images every day, which travel from real world to our consciousness. If dream deprivation exceeds normal borders - the flow of images appears, even if you close your eyes for a moment. This state is painful but at the same time beautiful. This experience seemed like the creation of always available image library and is holding ambition for rapid consumption of new information, which is being dictated by speed of modern devices.
response.title: Fatal Error - Blue Screen
